Home » Catering Equipment » Cooking Equipment » Fryers
Deep Fat Fryer Electric | Countertop Unit | C60 Modular Range Request Quotation
Click on image(s) to enlarge
Specifications&Available Models: (show / hide)
Product Code Dimensions Type Pan Volume Basket Dimensions Element Ratings Electrical Loading Gross Volume Weight C60100SPF W400mm x D600mm x H265mm Single Pan 1 x 8Lt 190mm x 280mm x 100mm 1 x 7.5kW 380V, 3~, 50Hz 0.11m 3 20kg C60100DPF W600mm x D600mm x H265mm Double Pan 2 x 8Lt 190mm x 280mm x 100mm 2 x 7.5kW 380V, 3~, 50Hz 0.16m 3 39kg
Body, paneling and wells made of stainless steel. Stainless steel basket. Suspension mechanism for the oil to leak down after the frying. Controlled by thermostat. Equipped with 1 basket in each well. Drainage tap. Request Quotation This product was added to our online catalog on Wednesday 28 September, 2011.
To view downloadable product documentation you may need to get the latest version of adobe acrobat reader .
